definition[0]: to formally or officially tell someone about something
example[0]: You will be notified of any changes in the system.
example[1]: In August we were notified that our article had been rejected.
definition[1]: to tell someone something officially or formally, usually by writing to them
example[2]: The company notified about 110 employees they would lose their jobs because of the planned closure.
example[3]: Customers affected by this change are being notified of their options by letter.
